start.state: I'm Sanako Isogai, eighteen years old.

case.state: I'm Sanako Isogai, eighteen years old.
It's so very nice to make your acquaintance!
Let's all get along, okay?
Is that a flying robot?
Okay.
One item per round. That's the rule.
Goodness, the drama club sure has a lot of different costumes, doesn't it?
Was it me?
So your name is Corrin? It's a pleasure to meet you. For a moment, I thought Corrin was a boy's name.
Those are beautiful wings, Miss Fairy. May I ask what they're made of?
I'm sure you want to keep those glasses on. How else will you see the game?
My, what a handsome prince!

This going to be fun, isn't it?
This is an unexpected but happy turn of events.
Don't worry about it.
Maybe we don't need to play strip poker after all. I can think of some other fun things to do.
Maybe some tea will cheer you up.
I guess a ladybird really can change her spots!

I thought I'd be the first one to do that.
Good boy!
It's okay if we start slow.
That's the way to do it.
Thanks, ~name~. You don't mind me using your first name, do you?
I'll take care of your clothing. You can start with your ~clothing~.
If... if you're sure that's what you want...
Don't misunderstand. I...
My, Samus! How scandalous!
We get to see more of ~name~? I'm happy to hear it.
Sorry, but these are the rules.
If your life can change once, it can change again for the better.
I've been trying to lose a few rounds to catch up, but you've beaten us all.
I really hope this is okay with you.
Home run!
Oh, I was wanting to see one of those!
Would you mind if I call you ~name~?
We didn't make you mad, did we, ~name~?
If you're determined to keep fighting, then I won't stop you.
Didn't you want to wait for the rest of us?
We didn't make you mad, did we,?
You're just going for it? You didn't want one of us to start you off?
How lovely. If I can share a secret, seeing ~name~ take his shirt off was my motivation for being here.
How lovely. If I can share a secret, seeing him take his shirt off was my motivation for being here.
Oh my, you're setting expectations high on the rest of us, aren't you?
So, uh...
But she...
My poor, innocent angel...
This game keeps getting better and better.
I'm sure we'd all be happy if you wanted to start taking the lead.
Someone that's not me has to take a turn first. And what's more, it's a boy!

Oh, I'm sorry. I thought you were old enough to play with us. I can walk you home right now if you like.
Ready, ~name~?
Ready?
That was close. Were you aiming for me?
How precious.

Let's not get too loud.
Was I good enough when it was my turn? What do you think, ~player~?
Everyone gets a turn to show off.
Maybe you should be a little more ladylike about this, ~name~.
The game is quickly drawing to a close.
Keep it down, you two!
Something a lot like this happened to me when I went to the public bathhouse one afternoon.
She lost this hand? Are you sure?
We're about to get a bit closer.
Stand up and keep fighting. You have to win for your own sake!
That's the way, Mia! Now you're getting into the spirit of things.
You can do it!
If you're feeling too embarrassed, maybe we could ask ~player~ to help.
The price of admitance to your show sure was steep, Mr. ~Name~.
I should have a word to your mother.
How can you keep playing at a time like this? Did my penalty mean nothing to you?
How can you keep playing at a time like this? Did our penalties mean nothing to you?
What a fine, muscular body you have. You'll make a fine husband someday.
Don't be shy. We all want to see.
Want me to run a finger up and down that strong chest of yours?
It's... I know it's not a competition.
Go on, ~name~.
It's your turn now, ~name~.
It's ~name~'s turn. Why should I settle for anyone else?
All I have left is hope.
Oh... It looks very unique.
That's okay, ~name~. I got to imagine that it was a lot bigger a few minutes ago when it really counted.
Boys, this is why you should always eat your vegetables.
Eating nothing but your ~name~ will leave us malnourished.
I hope you have more where that came from, mister.
Don't worry. The game is more than half over anyway.
Look at that. As healthy as can be.
Good job. I knew you could do it.
But I...
Help! What do we do? She's on fire!
Is it finally time... for that?
Oh, ~name~...
That should take a little stress off of you, right?
All done! Did you have fun today?
That was beautiful, Weiss. Thank you for sharing it with us. Was it your first time doing it in front of others?
There's no hurry. Whenever you're ready.
Oh my... Is he gonna confess his love to me?
You can come a little closer. We're in this together, after all.
There, there.
I wouldn't miss this for the world!
Although I'm a little embarrassed, if I hadn't given it a shot, I never would have experienced so much happiness.
I didn't reveal too much during my penalty, did I? Sometimes I say too much without even knowing it.
Don't forget that I have some baked goodies for you all. I can't wait for you to taste my buns.
Give it your best out there, you two!
I'm sorry that I showed you all such shameful conduct...
~Name~, let me be the first to get your autograph.
If you don't mind, I'd like to do this again sometime.

text.content: Thank you very much for testing Sanako! If you would like to give feedback, please comment on her channel on the game's Discord server and/or via the following survey form: https://goo.gl/forms/WyFo3wJ3p03nCz3Z2
